RT Austin Cain (📜,📜): This morning I joined @developer_dao ; if you work for a company building dev tools, you should too. My rationale: - Polyg...
entry.summary: RT Austin Cain (📜,📜) This morning I joined @developer_dao ; if you work for a company building dev tools, you should too. My rationale: - Polygon is a developer platform - Our partners enable developers - Our users are developers How best to understand the pain points of your users? Become one.

entry.summary: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢 Web3 Social Hub 🌿🪩 If you're planning to be in Bogotá 🇨🇴 for @EFDevcon events and want this to happen, hop into the forum and drop a comment or a like! ❤️ Thank you @shanvasion @Livepeer @AaveAave @LensProtocol @provenauthority @WaverlyMaven + others for spearheading this. 🙏 shann.lens @ ETHMexico🇲🇽: Coming to Bogotá 🇨🇴 and want to continue the @ethlatam convo on Web3 Social 🌿🪩❤️✨? A special squad (@WaverlyMaven @0xChristina @parisrouz @provenauthority and more) has put together a proposal for a Community Hub @EFDevcon and we'd love ur love!👇 https://forum.devcon.org/t/community-hub-proposal-web3-social/938

entry.summary: RT Emily 🔜 DappCon | EthBerlin Officially joined @developer_dao 🥰 I think I need PTO so I can read the bajillion of messages in the Discord 😂 These guys are ACTIVE and I. AM. HYPED. So many aspiring devrel folks too 🥹 I'm stoked that ppl realize how this role is critical to dev success (+web3 in general)

entry.title: RT NerdWithDopeHair: This comes a bit late but I'm officially among the newest members of @developer_dao thanks to @womenbuildweb3 and @dabit3 🥳�...
entry.summary:
RT NerdWithDopeHair This comes a bit late but I'm officially among the newest members of @developer_dao thanks to @womenbuildweb3 and @dabit3 🥳😁. This comes after trying multiple times to join through scholarships & failing. Everything comes full circle it seems!! A huge boost to my web3 journey!
WBW3 #30DaysOfWeb3: At 9am PST (~7 hours from now), we’ll be awarding @developer_dao NFTs, @surge_women NFTs, and @ensdomains to those participating in #30DaysOfWeb3 🎉🏃‍♀️💨 Join the livestream & we’ll give away some prizes to the chat https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=fjLAEKJO15k

entry.title: RT Ujjwal Thakur: For a long time, I wanted to be a part of the @developer_dao community and tried many to get into it through scholarships but failed...
entry.summary: RT Ujjwal Thakur For a long time, I wanted to be a part of the @developer_dao community and tried many to get into it through scholarships but failed. But finally won DD NFT in a giveaway from @womenbuildweb3. Thank you @womenbuildweb3, @camiinthisthang, @dabit3 and @developer_dao for this.
